title: 820-3209 ppbus8.18V
message:
820-3209 ppbus8.18V
Should I start by replacing SMC?

title: 820-3209 ppbus8.18V
message: Have you checked for communication between ISL6259 and SMC?

title: 820-3209 ppbus8.18V
message: Do you have green light??? SMC_RESET_L is high?? Voltage on SMBUS_CHGR_SCL and SMBUS_CHGR_SDA??  Could be a bad ISL or bad SMC...

title: 820-3209 ppbus8.18V
message: Figure out if the SMC is turning on first by measuring SMC_RESET_L before replacing it. If it isn't being told to leave reset mode then a new SMC will do the same thing as the present SMC!
